description: Ireland's most famous sports stadium, Croke Park, is being used in the fight against Covid-19.
title: Croke Park: From GAA battles to the fight against coronavirus
title_page: Croke Park: From GAA battles to the fight against coronavirus - BBC News
maintext: Maria Flaherty, the clinical nurse lead, says: "We put our names across the PPE so that the patients know what our names are and we're as friendly and as warm as we possibly can be because we want our patients to feel secure and happy in the environment."
